content.heroIntro: Welcome to ALCUSAT, an exclusive residential development by TAYLOR WIMPEY ESPAÑA located in the prestigious Avenida Golf area of Monforte del Cid, Alicante. This premium penthouse project offers discerning buyers the perfect blend of luxury living and investment potential on Spain's sought-after Costa Blanca. ALCUSAT features modern 3-bedroom penthouses with 2 bathrooms and 113m² of sophisticated living space, priced from just €269,000—representing exceptional value in a region experiencing consistent growth. Set to complete in September 2027, this development combines proximity to championship golf courses, pristine Blue Flag beaches, and established international amenities. Whether you're seeking a permanent residence, holiday retreat, or investment property with strong rental potential, ALCUSAT delivers world-class quality from a trusted developer with an established track record in the region. The development sits in Monforte del Cid, an increasingly popular destination for European expats and property investors attracted by excellent infrastructure, Mediterranean lifestyle, and genuine community atmosphere where English is widely spoken.

This sought-after area has transformed into a cosmopolitan hub attracting international residents, families, and investors. The location offers the perfect balance—close enough to urban amenities for healthcare, shopping, and dining, yet positioned within easy reach of some of Europe's finest golf courses and stunning Mediterranean beaches. Monforte del Cid benefits from excellent infrastructure, established schools including international options, and a thriving English-speaking community. The Avenida Golf location specifically provides frontline or near-frontline positioning to championship courses, making it ideal for golf enthusiasts. Beyond golf and beach pursuits, the area offers sophisticated dining, modern retail centers, and comprehensive healthcare facilities. Property values here have demonstrated consistent growth with +8% year-on-year appreciation, while prices remain 40% lower than comparable Spanish island markets.

faqs.question: Can foreigners buy property in Spain?
faqs.answer: Yes, foreigners can buy property in Spain without visa restrictions. Non-EU citizens typically need an NIE (tax identification number) for the purchase process. EU citizens can purchase freely. Our team can guide you through the legal requirements and connect you with English-speaking legal advisors to ensure smooth completion of your ALCUSAT purchase.

faqs.question: What are the costs of buying property in Spain?
faqs.answer: Beyond the purchase price, budget for: Transfer tax (6-10% depending on region), notary fees (approximately 1%), property registration fees (0.1%), and legal fees (1-2%). In Alicante, total additional costs typically range 8-13% of property value. Our advisors can provide detailed cost breakdowns for ALCUSAT purchases.
